text:
@realDonaldTrump What is the point of spending money on advertising when most of America is under lockdown!!

Are you REALLY this F**KING STUPID ???

BUT A PRESIDENT WITH NO MEDICAL EXPERTISE PROMOTING A DRUG UNTESTED AGAINST CORONAVIRUS MUST BE WORSE FOR AMERICA. 

AND THEN YOU DENY PROMOTING IT
